parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Camera Control

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Commit [[Post process effects|post process effect]] in given time.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> effect '''ppEffectCommit''' commit

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> effect: [[String]] - name of the effect

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> commit: [[Number]] - duration

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name> s2</name>=<value> handle '''ppEffectCommit''' commit

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> handle: [[Number]] - handle of the effect

</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> commit: [[Number]] - duration

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>s3</name>=<value> handles '''ppEffectCommit''' commit

</value></part><part><name>p41</name>=<value> handles: [[Array]] of [[Number]]s - list of handles

</value></part><part><name>p42</name>=<value> commit: [[Number]] - duration

</value></part><part><name>r3</name>=<value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>"colorCorrection" [[ppEffectCommit]] 3;</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_hndl [[ppEffectCommit]] 3;</code>

</value></part><part><name>x3</name>=<value> <code>[_hndl1, _hndl2] [[ppEffectCommit]] 3;</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[Post process effects]], [[ppEffectForceInNVG]], [[ppEffectEnable]], [[ppEffectEnabled]], [[ppEffectDestroy]], [[ppEffectCreate]], [[ppEffectCommitted]], [[ppEffectAdjust]]
</value></part></template>
